title: SummitStats
name: summit-stats
description: A platform to analyse your Strava data
text: SummitStats lets you analyse your Strava data with custom analytics and visualizations.

title: Strava Wrapper
name: strava-wrapper
description: Rust wrapper for the Strava API
text: A Rust wrapper for the Strava API, with a builder pattern for type-safe autocomplete.

title: Flow Parser
name: flow-parser
description: Parser for structured pipe delimited files
text: Parser for structured pipe delimited files. These files are used in industries such as healthcare and the UK energy industry.

title: Shopping List
name: shopping-list
text: A collaborative shopping list app that allows multiple users to live update the same list in real time.

title: Recipes
name: recipes
text: Ground-up Word2Vec implementation for clustering and recommending cooking recipes.
